value.document: Completed application form for transfer issued by the financial institution.
Latest three months’ Salary Slips indicating break-up of Gross salary that is the Basic Pay, House rent and Net Salary after deductions, if any.
Six months’ bank statement reflecting salary credits updated within 15 days before you apply for the loan.
Identity Proof (Any One): Pan Card, Passport, Driving License or Voter ID card or employee identity card (as identity proof and signature proof in case of government employees).
Proof of Age (Any 1): 10th or 12th Marks Cards, PAN Card or Voters ID Card.
For self-employed professionals or business persons: Documents proving the existence of their business (for businesspersons) Academic qualifications (for professionals) Financial statements.
Bank statements from the account from where the home loan EMIs were deducted in the last 12 months.
The Loan statement copy and complete set of documents relating to the property that is currently in possession of the present lender.

value.description: If you have a primary home loan with a lender, you can apply for a top-up over that to finance other needs such as furnishing and fixtures. Besides this, you can also use this additional fund for your medical expenses, family vacation or even to pay off your credit card debt(s)

Remember that multiple loans have a negative effect on your credit score. Therefore taking a loan under the same primary loan and consolidating debts is an advantage. It helps lower your expense towards interest and also makes payments easier.

There are multiple reasons you may need urgent funds for. With minimal processing fee and quick disbursal, this is an ideal way to meet your financial needs sooner, be it for wedding expenses, education fees and unforeseen emergencies.

Since the lender already has a pre-existing relationship with the borrower and is aware of their credit and repayment history, the documentation process while availing a Top-Up loan is generally less stringent. However, the documents necessary might vary a little based on the lender you opt for.
For a Top-Up loan, you do not need to provide collateral as security to the lender and, in most cases, you don’t even need a guarantor. This makes the process much faster than taking a new loan.

Lenders offer Top-Ups at lower interest rates than other kinds of unsecured loans. It is smarter to go for a Top-Up on an existing loan if you have one. Plus, the lender may also offer you the option of choosing between a fixed and floating interest rate.

The loan tenure for a Top-Up can be longer than that of a personal loan but cannot exceed the outstanding tenure of the primary loan. However, it depends on various factors such as your repayment capability, applied loan amount, and current outstanding amount.
The existing relationship with the lender helps speed up the process of sanction and disbursal of the funds, making it easier to avail than a personal loan.

Certain banks offer additional benefits like a Top-Up loan on Loan Balance transfer. This makes it easy for you to avail of an additional loan even if your current lender doesn’t approve your application for one.

Consolidating your loans can help remove the additional burden of paying off loans individually and even reduces the chances of forgetting and missing EMI payments. Most banks and financial companies allow borrowers to repay the original and Top-Up loans in a consolidated Equated Monthly Instalment (EMI). It also brings down your overall interest cost.

value.job: Data Analytics and Integrations Specialist- Marketing Analytics
value.summary: The Data Analytics and Integration Specialist is responsible for the implementation, configuration, and optimization of Google Analytics, Meta Pixels and Google Tag Manager for our website and other digital properties. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Analytics platforms, as well as experience with data analysis and reporting. They will also be able to work independently and as part of a team to deliver results.
responsibilities: Implement and configure Google Analytics/GTM and Meta Pixels on our website and other digital properties
Develop and optimize data collection plans
Create and manage Daily, Weekly and Monthly reports and dashboards
Analyze data to identify trends and opportunities
Work with stakeholders to interpret and act on data insights
Stay up-to-date on the latest Google Analytics features and best practices
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business, or a related field
Outstanding knowledge of Excel and Data automation & Visualisation
2+ years of experience with Google Analytics
Experience with data analysis and reporting
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team

responsibilities: Conceptualize, Design and Create scroll-stopping social media posts across channels including Emails, Facebook, Google, YouTube, Whatsapp, Instagram, Pinterest and LinkedIn.
Study and define the visual identity of the business to ensure consistency across mediums.
Work alongside Digital Marketing and Content teams to drive Company’s objectives by communication “story” through visually stimulating images.
Conduct A/B testing across mediums and increase engagement.
qualifications: 1 to 3 years of relevant experience.
Solid knowledge of design and visual principles.
Bachelor’s degree in graphic design, industrial design, interior design, or equivalencies.

Social Media Management Platforms: Proficiency in using popular social media management tools such as Hootsuite, Buffer, or Sprout Social to schedule and publish content, monitor engagement, and analyze performance.

Content Creation Tools: Experience with graphic design tools like Adobe Photoshop or Canva to create visually appealing images and graphics for social media posts. Familiarity with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or iMovie is a plus.

Analytics and Reporting Tools: Knowledge of social media analytics tools like Facebook Insights, Instagram Insights, or Google Analytics to track key metrics, measure campaign success, and generate reports.

Social Listening Tools: Familiarity with social listening tools such as Brandwatch, Mention, or Hootsuite Insights to monitor brand mentions, track industry trends, and gather insights for social media strategy.
Collaboration Tools: Proficiency in using collaboration tools like Google Drive, Trello, or Asana to coordinate with team members, manage content calendars, and streamline workflow.
Hashtag Research Tools: Experience with hashtag research tools like Hashtagify or RiteTag to identify relevant and trending hashtags for increased visibility and engagement.

value.summary: As a Motion Graphics Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually stunning and engaging short video content for various social media platforms. Your expertise in video editing and motion graphics will play a crucial role in enhancing our brand presence and captivating our target audience.
responsibilities: Collaborate with the creative team to conceptualize and develop compelling video content for social media platforms, including but not limited to Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and TikTok.
Utilize your expertise in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) to edit and enhance raw footage, ensuring seamless transitions, visual effects, and audio synchronization.
Create captivating motion graphics, animations, and visual effects to enhance the overall video content.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques in motion graphics and video editing, and apply them to create innovative and visually appealing content.
Work closely with the marketing team to understand project requirements, target audience, and brand guidelines, ensuring that the video content aligns with the company’s vision and objectives.
Collaborate with other designers, videographers, and content creators to ensure a cohesive and consistent visual style across all social media platforms.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality video content within given deadlines.
Maintain an organized library of video assets, templates, and project files for easy access and future use.
qualifications: 1 – 4 years of experience in Motion Graphics designing.
Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, or a related field is preferred.
Proven experience as a Motion Graphics Designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your video editing and motion graphics skills.
Proficiency in video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Affects or similar tools.
Excellent understanding of motion graphics principles, visual effects, and animation techniques.
Strong knowledge of social media platforms and their video requirements, including aspect ratios, file formats, and best practices.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work within given deadlines.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively present and articulate creative ideas.
Up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques in motion graphics, video editing, and social media marketing.

responsibilities: Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers.
Use an iterative design approach to come up with wireframes, mockups, and mood boards.
Map Storyboards to show and display a user’s story.
Create prototypes to show and demonstrate interactions.
Test for intuitive user experience, A/B testing and feedback-loop.
Combine creativity with an awareness of the design elements.
qualifications: 0 to 3 years of relevant experience.
Candidates with Design education will be preferred.
Ability to discuss and explain design options.
Detail oriented & critical thinker.
Problem solver and customer-centricity.
Knowledge of latest design trends and guidelines.
Self-motivated, dependable and hunger for learning.

**Transaction Reporting and Settlement on Online Bond Platform:**

Through clearing corporations, all bond transactions on FINCITY’s Platform must be registered and settled to the extent that it is legal to do so, however, off-line/off-market settlement may be carried out with the mutual permission of the Parties to the transaction.

You can use FINCITY’s platform to signal your desire to buy, sell, or otherwise transact in a financial instrument. The platform will then convey this information, along with your registration and contact information, to the seller(s) or counterparty appointed on FINCITY’s Platform.

The vendor(s), the Company, or the platform acting on their behalf, may get in touch with you (the User) to learn more about your precise needs before starting the transactions, which include the buying and selling of financial products at a predetermined price and under predetermined terms that may be negotiated directly between the User and the Seller.

The transaction(s) may also be rejected or not completed because the parties to the deal failed to fulfil their pay-in (funds and securities) obligations, or because of any other inaccurate or pending information.
